title: export Kerning pairs using FontCreator
content:
Hi all,

I need to use AutoKern feature of FontCreator to generate and export kerning pair values for a huge count of glyphs (to be processed by a text parser). FontCreator exports kerning values for only coded glyphs. I need to export for ligatures. How can I force it to export all glyphs (even with no unicode associated)?

(sorry! this post was sent on incorrect place before, on design forum)
author: Soroush
